data.name: Arcade Legend
data.description:
BUILD.  PLAY.  BOWL.  THROW.
Congratulations, you’ve inherited an arcade in the city’s premiere entertainment hub! It happens to be a little run-down, but with incredible tools and a wide variety of materials at your disposal you’ll rebuild your arcade, play official arcade games with friends and win tickets you can redeem for prizes inside your very own prize store! 

PREPARE FOR BATL!
Venture into the surrounding neighborhood and visit the newest entertainment venue on the block - BATL Axe Throwing, the pioneers of the sport!  Unleash your inner lumberjack to compete for high scores on a variety of incredible games, including a target so large it needs its own zipcode!  Unlock 10 larger than life axes from your prize store, then step up to the line, and let the axe-citement begin!

BUILD YOUR VERY OWN ARCADE PLAYGROUND
• Customize, clean and design your arcade
• Complete tasks to reveal secret areas
• Play arcade games and win tickets, prizes and more
• Multiplayer up to 4 people
• Explore other people’s public arcades

10 REAL ARCADE GAMES
• HYPERshoot
• HYPERpitch
• Let's Bounce
• Speed of Light
• Stacker
• Balloon Buster
• Chicken Farm
• Mega Color Match
• Mega Spin
• Prize Box
+ more free games coming in future updates!

NEW: BATL AXE THROWING!
A whole new venue!
10 larger than life axes to unlock in your prize store!
5 axe throwing game modes:
• Standard BATL 
• Classic Target 
• Tic-Tac-Toe
• Bullseye Blitz
• Ultra BATL

The ultimate arcade experience in VR!
